news.title: Manifest V3 Compatibility & Feature Updates
items: Migrated to Manifest v3, as required by Chrome & Edge stores
Removed 'Automatically start a streak on startup' feature (incompatible with Manifest V3 service workers)
Added this 'What's New' feature to keep you updated
Added option to disable notification sounds completely
Enhanced UI for single streak mode with better visual indicators
Improved dark theme contrast for better icon visibility
Enhanced cross-browser compatibility for Firefox and Chrome
Fixed audio playback delays - notifications now play instantly
Better error handling and state management
